organization.name: Creator Control Center

faq.question: Which platforms does Creator Control Center support?
faq.answer: We support Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, Twitter/X, Facebook, and Meta Ad accounts. You can manage all channels in one unified dashboard.

faq.question: Is there a free plan?
faq.answer: Yes, the free plan allows you to manage 1 channel. Upgrade to PRO or ENTERPRISE plans to access more channels and advanced features.

faq.question: What is the AI-powered CS response feature?
faq.answer: This is a feature for business customers that uses Gemini AI to automatically generate draft responses to creator inquiries. You can securely register your Gemini API key in the manager dashboard to use this feature.

faq.question: How often is data updated?
faq.answer: Data is collected and updated in real-time. You can immediately check the latest performance metrics on your dashboard.
